p: For in vitro assays, the aqueous extract was dissolved in methanol (Sigma-Aldrich®, Milan, Italy) in the concentration of 0.25 mg/ml, after being vortexed (Vortex, Phoenix AP56, Araraquara, São Paulo, Brazil) for 5 min and centrifuged at 4000 rpm at 0°C for 20 min (Eppendorf 5810 R) and the essential oil was diluted in the methanol in the concentration 0.33 mg/ml. The stock solution concentration of quercetin was 2 mg/ml.
